body:
Oh yeah, just to be clear: We should be storing these filters in the database, as we did in the past; we used to have a management command that ensured the channels and locales we wanted were in the database and available for foreign keys, which could (or could not) be re-used here. We'll want to pull locale info from `product_details`, and we may want to have a recurring job on prod to pull the latest locale data.

The simple filters should be compiled to JEXL that is included in the filter expression sent to the client; filtering should still happen completely on the client.
